## Food Security  
### Summary Statistics  
```{r}
fs <- bihs_household %>% select(fcs, dd_1_wheat, dd_2_wheat, dd_3_tubers, dd_4_cereals, dd_5_vegetables, dd_6_fruits, dd_7_beans, dd_8_eggs, dd_9_dairy, dd_10_meat, dd_11_poultry, dd_12_fish, dd_13_oils, dd_14_sugar, dd_15_condiments, dd_16_nuts, dd_16_nuts, dd_17_alcohol, hhs_total, hhs_1_nofood, hhs_2_sleephungry, hhs_3_hungry)
```

Summary of Food Consumption Score
```{r}
pander::pander( summary(fs$fcs, fs$hhs_total) )
```

Summary of Total Household Hunger Scale
```{r}
pander::pander( summary(fs$hhs_total) )
```

## Data Exploration Plots  
```{r}
gf_jitter(hhs_total ~ survey_year, data = bihs_household, ylab = "Household Hunger Scale", xlab = "Survey Year")
gf_jitter(fcs ~ survey_year, data = bihs_household, xlab = "Survey Year", ylab = "Food Consumption Score")
gf_jitter(underweight_high ~ survey_year, data = bihs_child, xlab = "Survey Year", ylab = "High Underweight Status")
underweight <- bihs_child %>% select(underweight_high, survey_year)

require(ggplot2)
gf_bar(..prop..~survey_year, data = underweight, xlab = "Child Severely Underweight", ylab = "Count")
ggplot(underweight) + geom_bar(aes(x = survey_year, y = ..prop.., group = 1), stat = 'count')
```
